name: Hot Dog!
description:
Made in 9 days for goGodotJam

A hungry dachshund scarfs down hot dogs in this wiggly physics platformer

--Controls--

WASD OR Left Joystick - Hind Legs (W / Lstick Up- Jump, S / Lstick Up - Anchor)

Arrow Keys OR Right Joystick - Front Legs (W / Rstick Up- Jump, S / Rstick Down - Anchor)  While holding down with one end the other can move up freely unrestricted by gravity

hold SPACE OR R1 - Grab

P / Start / Dualshock Options / Nintendo + - Pause

--Team--

Character design and art by Shepherd - @mushishepherd[Twitter] - @mushishepherd[Instagram]

Programming and art by KassieKitsune and GreedyEve - @LanFanHasA[Twitter]
